macros.sourceContext:
| {{QuickLinksWithSubpages("/en-US/docs/Web/WebDriver/Commands")}} > |

The Get Element Property command of the WebDriver API returns the property of the referenced web element. Given <input value=foo> where the user changes the value to bar, the returned property is bar rather than the initial value foo. This is equivalent to calling {{domxref("Element.getProperty")}} on the element.

^ |

Syntax

|

title: Get Element Property
summary: The Get Element Property command of the WebDriver API returns the property of the referenced web element. Given <input value=foo> where the user changes the value to bar, the returned property is bar rather than the initial value foo. This is equivalent to calling Element.getProperty on the element.
